channel.title: Hmm possible?
channel.description: is it possible to make dual wielding possible...with both weapons doing seperate damage put only allowing some to do it like...rune daggers times 2....but make the time in between hitting longer?

item.title: Hmm possible?
item.dc:creator: @puppy_boy puppy boy
item.description:
@puppy_boy wrote:

its possible but it would be very complicated to actually code lol
i might try it but the general layout would be
if your already wearing this wep then it goes to the sheild slot
and if your wearing 2 of the same wep it does an increased timer with 2 damage things each time the timer runs out
